ingredients: Citron vodka: 1½ oz.|peach liqueur: ½ oz.|apple liqueur: ¼ oz.|simple syrup: ¼ oz.|lime juice: ¼ oz.|strawberry: 1|5 basil leaves|Garnish: strawberry
instructions: To make simple syrup, mix equal parts hot water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Muddle the strawberry and basil leaves in a cocktail shaker. Add remaining ingredients. Shake and serve in a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a strawberry.

ingredients: Triple Sec: 1/2 oz.|Sour Apple Pucker: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 oz.|Cream: 1 oz.|Sour Mix: 3 oz.|Sprite: 1 splash|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice excluding heavy cream and Sprite. Strain into a martini glass. Splash Sprite and layer heavy cream on top.

ingredients: Vodka: 1 oz.|Sour Grape Pucker: 1 oz.|Sour Island Punch Pucker: 1/2 oz.|Cream: 1 oz.|Sour Mix: 3 oz.|Sprite: 1 splash|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice excluding the heavy cream.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Layer heavy cream on top.

ingredients: Vodka: 1 oz.|Irish Cream: 2 oz.|Rum, overproof/151 proof: 1 1/3 oz.|Schnapps, lemon: 2 oz.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

ingredients: Goldschlager: 3 oz.|Cream: 2 oz.|
instructions: Pour ingredients into a beer mug and stir.

ingredients: Rum, spiced: 3 oz.|Bitters, Angostura: 3 dashes|Grenadine: 1 oz.|Root Beer: 7 oz.|Ice: 5 cubes|
instructions: Add all ingredients into glass& stir& and enjoy.

ingredients: Gin: 1 shot|Cider, hard: 1 bottle|
instructions: Pour cider into glass.  Pour gin into cider and stir gently.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1 part|Rum, spiced: 1 part|Tequila, gold: 1 part|Triple Sec: 1 part|Grenadine: 1 part|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 1 part|7-up: 3 parts|Ice: 3 cubes|
instructions: Mix the two liquids together with ice if desired.

ingredients: Vodka, raspberry: 2 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1 dash|Lemonade: Fill with, 1/2|Sprite: Fill with, 1/2|
instructions: Add ice to your preference. Follow with 2 1/2 oz of raspberry vodka& and then fill the glass the rest of the way with equal amounts of lemonade and Sprite. Drizzle grenadine to taste.

ingredients: Brandy: 1 1/4 oz.|Rum, dark: 1 dash|Triple Sec: 1 dash|Lemon: 1 tsp.|
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

ingredients: Amaretto: 1/2 shot|Vodka: 1 shot|Cranberry Juice: 1 part|Grenadine: 1 dash|Orange Juice: 1 part|Pineapple Juice: 1 part|
instructions: Add the vodka (80 proof preferable) and the amaretto& add the juices& end with a splash of grenadine. Once you've enjoyed the colored layers& stir and enjoy.

ingredients: Rum, coconut: 3 oz.|Dr. Pepper: 6 oz.|
instructions: Pour Coconut Rum into a highball glass full of ice& then fill glass with Dr. Pepper. Garnish with 2 stemmed cherries and serve with a straw.

ingredients: Bourbon: 1 shot|Gin: 1 shot|Rum, coconut: 2 shots|Whiskey, straight grain: 1 1/2 shot|Orange Juice: Fill with|Ice: 2 cubes|
instructions: Mix the liquor in the glass and shake up gently. Add the ice and then top off with the orange juice.

ingredients: Bourbon: 1 oz.|Brandy: 1/2 oz.|Liqueur, raspberry: 1/2 oz.|Fruit Juice: 1 1/2 oz. (Cran-blueberry)|Ice: 1 handful|
instructions: Swish all this around in the glass and you are ready to drink.

ingredients: Rum, spiced: 3 oz.|Bitters, Angostura: 3 dashes|Root Beer: 1 can|Ice: 5 cubes|
instructions: Start by putting the cubes of ice into the cup& add the rum. Then add the can of root beer and lastly add the bitters. Stir and enjoy.

ingredients: Bourbon: 1 oz.|Schnapps, peach: 1/3 oz.|Vermouth, dry: 3/4 oz.|Bitters, peychaud: 2 dashes|Ice: 1 handful|
instructions: Get all this into the glass and drink!

ingredients: Schnapps, peach: 2 oz.|Vodka: 1/2 oz.|Grenadine: 1/2 oz.|Lime Juice: 1/4 oz.|Sour Mix: 1/2 oz.|Strawberries: 3 whole|Ice: 2 Cups|
instructions: Put ingredients into blender& and blend until all the strawberry chunks are blended in. Pour into glass.

drink_name: Ewok In Blackwater Castle Channeling The Ghost of WB Yeats
ingredients: Liqueur, honey: 2 oz.|Amaretto: 2 oz.|Whiskey, Canadian: 7 1/2 oz.|Vodka, pepper: 1 oz.|Orange Juice: 2 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass.

ingredients: Bourbon: 1 1/2 oz.|Sour Mix: 1 oz.|Ice: 1 handful|
instructions: Add ingredients to glass& and stir it (or not) to preference.

ingredients: Curacao, blue: 1/2 tsp.|Liqueur, raspberry: 1 oz.|Vodka: 1 1/2 oz.|Sour Mix: 1 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Build over ice in the glass.

ingredients: Liqueur, melon: 1 part|Triple Sec: 1 part|Vodka: 3 parts|
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.  Strain into glass half-filled with ice.

ingredients: Champagne: 2 1/2 oz.|Orange Juice: 2 1/2 oz.|
instructions: Pour chilled orange juice, and add chilled champagne.

ingredients: Cognac: 1 oz.|Grand Marnier: 1 oz.|
instructions: Combine ingredients in a brandy snifter.
